messages.message: Just noticing that the new apps page is not accessible when not authenticated. Clicking `See More` results in an auth dialog. Can we make this page available so that unauth users can also see our Marketplace apps and try them with sample values? @Heymian @hannah

Yeah, we do realize that the guest users will no longer be able to view more than 6 public apps. We only have a couple days to work on the app page so that's why we "sacrificed" the guest user's experience :sweat_smile:  but yea, we should def revisit this
Yes @avi - this was a technical constraint to get out the app page for launch. If we want to ungate the full apps tab for guest users, let's create an EPD ticket and we can open back up.
Makes sense, if it's a low lift, would be great to ungate this to allow guest users to explore the full apps tab :slightly_smiling_face:
